data.name: Winter Survival Demo
data.detailed_description:
What was supposed to be a nice winter hike in Mount Washington State Park with friends, turned into a dire situation. You are left alone to fight for your survival. With only marginal supplies you have to fight off of the cold, the wildlife and find your way to an abandoned ranger station in hope to be able to call for help.

This demo provides an entry into Winter Survival Simulator, showing you the base mechanics and allowing you to experience a small portion of the journey to see what the game is all about and how it plays.

content_descriptors.notes: Winter Survival Simulator may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages. The game contains bad language in the form of the protagonist cursing. It also contains visual violence towards animals and blood (hunting wild animals for survival or getting injured).
